code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import*as db from"./Database";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Dashboard(){const courses=db.courses;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"wd-dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"wd-dashboard-title",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{id:"wd-dashboard-published",children:["Published Courses (",courses.length,")"]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"wd-dashboard-courses",className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row row-cols-1 row-cols-md-5 g-4",children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wd-dashboard-course col",style:{width:"300px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card rounded-3 overflow-hidden",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/Kanbas/Courses/${course._id}/Home`,className:"wd-dashboard-course-link text-decoration-none text-dark",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://miro.medium.com/v2/1*K0a7xINk0RM5gfXGSN68cw.png",width:"100%",height:160}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"wd-dashboard-course-title card-title",children:[course.name," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"wd-dashboard-course-title card-text overflow-y-hidden",style:{maxHeight:100},children:[course.description," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:" Go "})]})]})})}))})})]});}
